video.title: Really Me
video.synopsis: Maddy Cooper was an ordinary 15-year-old until she won a contest and landed her own reality TV show. Now, her family's life will never be the same.

episodes.synopsis: A teenage girl wins a contest to get her own reality TV show with her best friend and sidekick but quickly learns that stardom has its challenges.
episodes.title: A Star Is Born

episodes.synopsis: A fan's disparaging post sends Maddy into a tailspin as she tries to track down the offender; Ray is melancholy when his family forgets his birthday.
episodes.title: Fandemonium

episodes.synopsis: Maddy's TV show is up for an award, but when her parents ground her for getting into trouble at school, she may not make it to the ceremony.
episodes.title: Grounded in Reality

episodes.synopsis: When Ray goes away for the weekend, Maddy accidentally wrecks his prized possession and desperately tries to restore it before he gets back.
episodes.title: Score

episodes.synopsis: When Clarke entrusts Maddy with a crucial mission, their relationship hangs in the balance; Brody tries to help an ailing Ray feel better.
episodes.title: Comedy Gold…Fish

episodes.synopsis: Maddy uses her popularity to raise money for a worthy cause, but when Brody launches a similar fundraiser, good intentions give way to competition.
episodes.title: Too Cute

episodes.synopsis: When Maddy spoils her family's plans to spend Christmas vacationing in Hawaii, she tries to find a way to set things right.
episodes.title: A Very Maddy Christmas

episodes.synopsis: The combination of the overprotective men in her family and the burdens of fame stands in the way of Maddy's romantic life.
episodes.title: Save the Date!

episodes.synopsis: When Maddy encounters an old friend, she faces a difficult choice; Brody enters a sleeping competition, creating a nightmare for Ray and Clarke.
episodes.title: Tough Break

episodes.synopsis: Charlene creates a phony commercial for Maddy's show and stirs up trouble between Maddy and Tiara; Brody advises Clarke on how to win Julia's heart.
episodes.title: Best Frenemies Forever

episodes.synopsis: When Maddy is invited to become a spokesperson for the Beach Shack, she is forced to make a choice that could put her at odds with her loved ones.
episodes.title: Jealous of My Relish

episodes.synopsis: Maddy finds herself in a tight spot when Newton asks Julia to go with him; Brody tries to step into the role of man of the house.
episodes.title: Madd Matt

episodes.synopsis: When Maddy's father lays down the law, she rebels and attempts a daring stunt in order to rescue her TV show from cancellation.
episodes.title: Really Donkers

episodes.synopsis: When Tiara hires a Hollywood manager, Maddy wants one, too. Julia takes the job and lands Maddy a role in a zombie movie.
episodes.title: A Newtmare on Elm Street

episodes.synopsis: When Maddy gets an "F" on a school project, she convinces her father that the teacher is evil, so he decides to homeschool the kids.
episodes.title: Cooper Collegiate

episodes.synopsis: When a lookalike contest reveals Maddy's doppelgänger, Maddy sees a chance to take time off and sends the girl to attend a function in her place.
episodes.title: You're Really Me

episodes.synopsis: When Maddy must fib in order to promote a product, Brody makes a wager with Maddy to prove his belief that she is a terrible liar.
episodes.title: Truth or Dare

episodes.synopsis: The Cooper home is transformed into the movie set for a new zombie film, and Maddy gets a leading role thanks to her new manager, Julia.
episodes.title: Residence Evil

episodes.synopsis: When Maddy pretends to be a waitress so she can meet a cute guy, she lands her first real job -- and causes the Beach Shack to get shut down.
episodes.title: Sauce Boss

episodes.synopsis: Maddy and Julia decide to pull a prank on Brody and dupe him into thinking he has had an alien encounter, but when it works, events spin out of orbit.
episodes.title: U.F.O.-Ney

episodes.synopsis: Julia's crush on the star of the school play cues her to audition for the role of his love interest, but Maddy gets the part; Ray finds an odd toy.
episodes.title: Clap of Thunder

episodes.synopsis: Maddy is determined to get Clarke a spectacular birthday gift; Ray tries to plan a great party; Julia and Maddy camp out.
episodes.title: Get 'em to the Geek

episodes.synopsis: Aching to prove to her dad that she can handle responsibility, Maddy agrees to baby-sit, unaware the job is for the night of Julia's Halloween bash.
episodes.title: Scary Poppins

episodes.synopsis: Ray has had enough and tries to put an end to Maddy and Brody's squabbles, but when nothing seems to work, he takes extreme measures.
episodes.title: Cuffed Up

episodes.synopsis: When Maddy inadvertently causes Tiara's boyfriend to break up with her, she hosts a dating show to try and make amends -- but makes a mess instead.
episodes.title: Oh Brody, Where Art Thou?

episodes.synopsis: Maddy is invited to celebrate her birthday on the TV show "Extreme Sixteen" -- if she agrees to the producer's caveat that she must dump Julia.
episodes.title: Extreme Sixteen
